    • Constructor Detail

      • VanillaEventLoop

        public VanillaEventLoop​(net.openhft.chronicle.core.threads.EventLoop parent,
                        String name,
                        Pauser pauser,
                        long timerIntervalMS,
                        boolean daemon,
                        boolean binding,
                        int bindingCpu)
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent event loop
        name - the name of this event hander
        pauser - the pause strategy
        timerIntervalMS - how long to pause
        daemon - is a demon thread
        binding - set affinity
        bindingCpu - cpu to bind to
